Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, but without airconditioning!”
Reviews.Author: Jb-tb
Reviews.Content: spend couple days hotel summer 2010 visit berlin hotel located quiet friendly close subway station easily explore western city subway charlottenburg sbahn staff service friendly offered bussiness allthough paid regular tourist breakfast outstanding times german hotels ok clean bit hardly space suitcase floor shower pretty cramped biggest issue hotel lack airconditioning problematic hot summer months luckily window backside hotel night didnt hear traffic overall experience
